channel.title: World of Cars: Pit Crew News

item.title: Speed Fun with Speed Chat
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: <font face="verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif">A Car on the move doesn't always have the time to type in Chat phrases. That's where Speed Chat comes in.</font>
item.description: <font face="verdana,arial,helvetica,sans-serif">A Car on the move doesn't always have the time to type in Chat phrases. That's where Speed Chat comes in.</font>

item.title: Happy Holidays!
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: <font face="Verdana">It's that time of year again. The holidays are here. New Year's is coming up. Hooray! </font>
item.description: <font face="Verdana">It's that time of year again. The holidays are here. New Year's is coming up. Hooray! </font>

item.title: Bragging Badges
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: <font face="Verdana">In World of Cars, you can earn your bragging rights by getting Badges. Each Badge has its own cool design. Everybody'll be able to see them in your profile.</font>
item.description: <font face="Verdana">In World of Cars, you can earn your bragging rights by getting Badges. Each Badge has its own cool design. Everybody'll be able to see them in your profile.</font>

item.title: SLIPPING, BLASTING AND BOOMING
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: <font face="Verdana">You'll be able to race against your friends for 1st Place and the sweet spots on the Leader Boards.</font>
item.description: <font face="Verdana">You'll be able to race against your friends for 1st Place and the sweet spots on the Leader Boards.</font>

item.title: Blasting Robot Spark Plugs into Dust
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: <font face="Verdana">Remember in the movie Cars when Lightning had his daydream that he was Lightning Storm? He was zooming through the sky blasting spark plug robots into dust (exactly what I hope to do if I grow up!).</font>
item.description: <font face="Verdana">Remember in the movie Cars when Lightning had his daydream that he was Lightning Storm? He was zooming through the sky blasting spark plug robots into dust (exactly what I hope to do if I grow up!).</font>

item.title: NEW PLAYER TUTORIAL
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: So is World of Cars going to have a New Player Tutorial? Yep! But we'll keep it short and sweet. Your old friend Mater'll greet yah and teach yah a couple of moves.
item.description: So is World of Cars going to have a New Player Tutorial? Yep! But we'll keep it short and sweet. Your old friend Mater'll greet yah and teach yah a couple of moves.

item.title: IT'S SPARKING TIME!
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: <font face="Verdana">You got questions, you want insider info, or you just want to hang out? This is where you want to be. </font>
item.description: <font face="Verdana">You got questions, you want insider info, or you just want to hang out? This is where you want to be. </font>

item.title: Play to Pay
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary:
In earlier posts we've talked about customizing your Car and personalizing your Yard.

But we left one thing out. How do you get all this stuff? Does it just fall from the sky when you honk your horn?
item.description:
In earlier posts we've talked about customizing your Car and personalizing your Yard.

But we left one thing out. How do you get all this stuff? Does it just fall from the sky when you honk your horn?

item.title: Swimming With Cars!
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: <font face="Verdana">Everybody seems to want a pool or a pond. I liked Cruise Coneway's idea that if Cars can't swim, they should have floaties for their tires. It'd be great if they could go scuba diving too and water-skiing</font>
item.description: <font face="Verdana">Everybody seems to want a pool or a pond. I liked Cruise Coneway's idea that if Cars can't swim, they should have floaties for their tires. It'd be great if they could go scuba diving too and water-skiing</font>

item.title: YARD SWEET YARD
item.dc:creator: Sparks
item.atom:summary: <font face="Verdana">But sooner or later, we all want to pull in for a pit stop. And what better pit stop is there than your own home?</font>
item.description: <font face="Verdana">But sooner or later, we all want to pull in for a pit stop. And what better pit stop is there than your own home?</font>
